frustrated:
Need parking space or I'm starting 
a carpool on the roof.
Why do all roads lead to 'no parking'?

In search of my happy place... 
AKA a parking spot.
Should've bought a helicopter instead.

If I had a dime for every spot taken, 
I'd own the parking lot.
Brb, circling the lot for the 100th time.

Finding a soulmate seems easier 
than finding a parking spot.
I came, I saw... I circled the lot.
In a relationship with the 'P' sign.
Growing old waiting for a parking spot.
The quest for the holy grail was probably easier.

If parking was an Olympic sport, 
I'd still be in last place.

Looking for a parking spot, 
send help.
Starting to miss my old tricycle.

Next time, I'm buying a car 
that comes with its own parking spot.
Fancy a game of Parking Spot Hunt?

Car for sale: spends more time 
looking for parking than driving.
Is there a cheat code for instant parking?
Meeting? Haha. I haven't even found a parking.

I didn't sign up for this episode of 
'Parking Spot Wars'.

Honey, I'll be late. 
I'm stuck in a parking saga.

I'm sure my car is enjoying this 
tour of the parking lot.

One does not simply park in a 
bustling city.

Who needs a gym when you've got 
a parking lot workout?

This isn't parking, 
it's car hide-and-seek!

I didn't choose the parking life. 
The parking life chose me.
Pardon me while I park my car in another timezone.
Parking: The ultimate test of patience.

One small step for man, 
one giant leap to find a parking spot.

Time for my daily game of 
Spot the Parking Spot.

Accepting bets on whether 
I'll find a spot first, or retire.

If I had a penny for every minute 
I've spent looking for parking, 
I'd be a millionaire.

My GPS says 'you have reached your destination', 
but where's the parking?!

I've circled so much, 
I'm getting dizzy. 
Where's that parking spot?

I wonder if my car gets as tired as 
I do searching for a spot.

Looking for parking is my car's 
favorite cardio workout.

One day, I'll tell my grandkids about 
the great parking lot odyssey.
I think I just saw a tumbleweed roll byâ€¦

Siri, find me the nearest parking spot, 
please!

Time to play my least favorite game: 
parking lot roulette.

I've got 99 problems, 
and parking is all of them.

I swear, the parking spots are playing 
musical chairs without me.

If I spend any longer searching, 
I'm going to need to refuel.

Thinking about adopting a homing pigeon 
to find parking spots for me.

There's no 'I' in 'park', 
but there is an 'I' in 'circle 
the parking lot for the fifth time'.

I bet even Columbus found America faster 
than I can find a parking spot.

If I park any further away, 
I'll be in the next town over.

Guess it's time for my daily game of 
parking spot bingo.

Wanted: a magic carpet, 
because Aladdin never had parking issues.

Guess who's going on an 
unexpected parking safari!

Parking lots are just adult versions 
of musical chairs.

Did all the parking spaces go on 
vacation or something?

There are two types of people: 
those who find parking, 
and those who don't. 
Guess which one I am.

Park anywhere, they said. 
It'll be easy, they said.

I've seen unicorns, 
the Loch Ness monster, 
but a free parking spot? Never.

"Siri, find me the nearest parking spot, please!" 
Siri: "Hmm, there's a spot 200 miles away. Ready for a road trip?"

validation.start-time-invalid: Start time should be greater than current time
validation.end-time-invalid: End time should be greater than start time

auth.not-account: Do not have an parky account?

message.no-parking: No parking slots found in this area.
message.no-company: You don't have a company yet.
message.not-a-valet-2: Please contact the company's managers with your ID.
message.valet-description: Our valets will whisk your car away to its reserved spot and bring it back when you're ready. It's like magic, but with cars!
message.valet-description-dropoff: Want your car delivered somewhere else? No problem! Choose a different drop-off point and we'll make sure your ride is there waiting for you.
message.add-different-dropoff: Add a different drop off location?

toast.error-creating-booking: An error occurred while creating the booking session.

admin.remove-admin: Are you sure you want to delete this innocent soul from the admin realm?
